Text:
Sorry, forgot to mention that Hour 2 is fucked after the first commercial break.  I lost 2-3 mins of air time max.  I don't think it takes away too much and today's show was too important to get up asap so I did my best.

Hour 3 ends oddly as if Glenn lost track of which hour he was in.  He says they'll be back in a second, but it's definitely the end of hour 3.
